title: Power series for e^(-2x^2) part - b

content.question: Find the interval of convergence of the power series for f (x) about x =0 . Show the analysis that leads to your conclusion.

frqParts.text: Find the interval of convergence of the power series for f (x) about x =0 . Show the analysis that leads to your conclusion.

topic.text: 10.13: (BC ONLY) Radius and Interval of Convergence of Power Series

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Identify a re-expression of mathematical information presented in a given representation
